00041 class ObexClientPort : public ObexAbstractPort {
00042 
00043     public:
00044         typedef ObexAbstractPort    Base;
00045 
00057         ObexClientPort(ObexAbstractTransport &  transport,
00058                        ObexProtocol &           protocol,
00059                        ObexClientDispatcher &   client);
00060 
00062         inline  BOOLEAN     IsConnected() const;
00063 
00064     protected:
00065         virtual void        StartAddrResolution();
00066         virtual void        AbortAddrResolution();
00067 
00068         virtual BOOLEAN     AcquireChannel(ObexChannel &        channel,
00069                                            const ObexAddrPtr &  addr_ptr,
00070                                            ObexResult           result);
00071

00073         virtual void        CloseChannel(ObexResult cause);
00074

00076         virtual void        OnChannelOpened(ObexResult  result);
00077 
00078     private:
00079         EventType   EnableAction(FsmEngine &, EventType, ObjectObtainer &);
00080 
00081         // Initial state and state after port has been closed again.
00082         FSM_DECLARE_STATE(s1_initially);
00083 
00084         // Port is waiting for availability state to become 'AvsReady'
00085         FSM_DECLARE_STATE(s1_wait_avs);
00086 
00087         // Port is detaching from transport (procedure running)
00088         FSM_DECLARE_STATE(s1_detaching);
00089 
00090         // Port is attaching to transport (procedure running)
00091         FSM_DECLARE_STATE(s1_attaching);
00092 
00093         // Port is connected to a remote server.
00094         FSM_DECLARE_STATE(s1_connected);
00095 
00096         ObexClientDispatcher &      m_client;
00097 
00098         void                        EnableTransport();
00099 };

00101 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00102     IsConnected
00103     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00104 BOOLEAN     ObexClientPort::IsConnected()
00105 const
00106 {
00107     return  IsInState( FSM_STATE_FROM_NAME(s1_connected) );
00108 }// IsConnected
